By Daneasaur on Thursday, January 6, 2011 - 11:15 am:

Well, it's been a while since I needed to clone some CDs, so long in fact that my family has since obtained a new computer.

I transfered the files of Clone CD from that computer to this one, but it would not operate properly as the image file no longer existed since this was not the computer it was origionally installed on.

But I kept the origional zip file of the installation device.

I activated it and unzipped it fine, but when I went to run the clone CD, it gave an error saying that it could not open a specific... Erm... thing... like "error @702" or something along those lines.

I re-downloaded it from the link provided in the instructions (which worked before) and still have the same issue.

Basically, I am assuming that this is an issue pertaining to an incompatability with Vista (duh).

Does anyone have a working version that works WITH vista or am I basically no longer able to clone my own monster CDs?

Feel free to ask questions.
